title: Are national football players required to stand in the field during the national anthem?
subtitle: The confusion about whether the Rulebook or the National Armed Forces Game Operations Manual specifically requires players to stand on the side line while playing before the game of the American National Anthem.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The National Football Union Rulebook contains a list that specifically requires players to stand on the side line while playing before the game of the American National Anthem.
